00036 class IsotopeCalculator
00037 {
00038     public:
00039     
00040     IsotopeCalculator(double abundanceCutoff, double massPrecision);
00041     ~IsotopeCalculator();
00042 
00043     enum NormalizationFlags
00044     {
00045         NormalizeMass = 0x01,       // shift masses -> monoisotopic_mass == 0
00046         NormalizeAbundance = 0x02   // scale abundances -> sum(abundance[i]^2) == 1 
00047     };
00048     
00049     Chemistry::MassDistribution distribution(const Chemistry::Formula& formula,
00050                                              int chargeState = 0,
00051                                              int normalization = 0) const;
00052     private:
00053     class Impl;
00054     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00055 
00056     // no copying
00057     IsotopeCalculator(const IsotopeCalculator&);
00058     IsotopeCalculator& operator=(const IsotopeCalculator);
00059 };
